node.title: How to install Apps from anywhere in osx
node.excerpt: Gatekeeper in Mac osx is security application blocking installation of application downloaded from anywhere. By disabling you can install it without error.
node.custom_excerpt: Gatekeeper in Mac osx is security application blocking installation of application downloaded from anywhere. By disabling you can install it without error.
node.meta_title: How to install Apps downloaded from anywhere in osx
node.meta_description: Gatekeeper in Mac osx is security application blocking installation of application downloaded from anywhere. By disabling you can install it without error.

authors.name: Daegyun Na
authors.bio: "The greatest discovery of my generation is that a human being can alter his life by altering his attitudes"

primary_author.name: Daegyun Na
primary_author.bio: "The greatest discovery of my generation is that a human being can alter his life by altering his attitudes"

node.plaintext:
> If you meet the error shows your installation cannot be continue as the
installater file may be damaged when you try to install application downloaded
from the internet.
Installing application on Mac has 3 types (Application verified from the Mac App
store,  Application  from identified developer, and Application from anywhere)
and here Installation application from anyhwere will be introduced.

If you try to install application downloaded from identified developer and get
error, open security & privacy in system preference and check 

Gatekeeper in osx
Mac osx has a security applicatoin made by apple to secure what applications get
in and which ones are kept out. Apple review application for safe use and
publish it in App store. Other than applications downloaded from App Store,
Gatekeeper allows to install whose applications are not in the App Store but
they make secure application that has been tested and provide by Apple, as
application from identified developer.

If you want to install application neigher from identified developer nor from
App Store, you can disable Gatekeeper by entering some command in terminal.

How to disable Gatekeeper
Open Terminal and enter 'sudo spctl --master-disable

Sudo spctl --master-disable

Enter your login password to allow application installation downloaded from
anywhere

You can now install application downloaded from anywhere if you check security &
Prvacy tap.
